radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal hepatic parenchyma with smooth contour and no focal liver mass. Patent main portal vein with hepatopetal flow. No ascites. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. CBD measures 6 mm. Multiple gallstones and layering sludge in a distended gallbladder, with suspicion of an impacted stone at the gallbladder neck. Normal echogenicity of spleen. No evidence of hydronephrosis in right kidney. Visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
